summary: Make the pinned version parameter optional when setting a pinned override on an already-pinned workflow, aligning with API semantics from the temporal/api repository.
userImpact: Developers will have a simpler API for managing pinned workflow versions by not requiring redundant version specifications.
proposedFix: Follow the API semantics defined in temporalio/api to make the pinned version parameter optional when setting a pinned override on an already-pinned workflow.
resolutionDetails: Enhancement request to align SDK API with existing API semantics for versioning GA.
